abstract: The deal comes months after Visa paid more than $2.1 billion to American Express over similar antitrust claims.
snippet: The deal comes months after Visa paid more than $2.1 billion to American Express over similar antitrust claims.
lead_paragraph: MasterCard Worldwide agreed on Wednesday to pay $1.8 billion to its credit card rival American Express to settle claims related to a 2004 antitrust lawsuit.

headline.main: MasterCard Will Pay $1.8 Billion to American Express
headline.print_headline: MasterCard Will Pay $1.8 Billion To a Rival
